page.title: 20ENERGY.
page.content: Forty years ago the only sources of energy in the village were coal, wood, oil and bottled gas . Today most houses have electricity although there are no gas mains in the village. Piped water and mains drainage are now available to most homes. Housholds now have number of labour saving devices such as Washing Machines,Tumble Driers. Dishwashers are becoming commonplace. There is no street lighting. On several occasions snow storms have isolated the village and brought down electricity power cables for up to a week. Thus the old sources of energy are still the best and most reliable and most homes are still equiped to use them.
